description.@en: Invoking righteous anger and vengeance, you instill the god’s power unto another.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch is given the gift of retribution. They may add a 1D6 Fury Die to their next Total Damage roll with a melee or ranged weapon.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above and the person may add the Punishing Quality to their weapon.

criticalFailure.@en: Your invocation has angered the god of war. As a result, the next attack successfully made upon you with a melee or ranged weapon inflicts an additional 1D6 Fury Die to the Total Damage roll and adds the Punishing Quality.

reagents.@en: Ink or dye, which is painted on the person’s hands or face (expended)

system.distance: Any one person you can touch
